attributes.action: Help couples with children from previous relationships and has a patner with cystic fibrois have at least one cycle of IVF on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My name is Hayley Cretch and my fiance is Jamie Fox who has cystic fibrosis and diabetes. We are trying to have a baby but due to jamie illness we are unable to have them naturally, we have gone down the path of ivf but have been turned down due to the fact I have a child from a previous relationship. We have wrote letters to our local PCT and they have refused to give us funding even though we have got exceptional cicumstance, we feel we have been treated very unfairly and are rather upset as without ivf we are unable to have a child of our own that we hope for.
